titleStmt.title: A just rebuke to the Quakers insolent behaviour, in their two books, i.e. A just censure, &c. the other, A sober reply, &c. both presented to some members of Parliament. : Also a dialogue between a civilian and a Quaker.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, by Rich. Janeway, Jun. near Doctors-Commons.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
